title: Sunny's Honey Dijon Pretzel Dip
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk the mayonnaise, honey, mustard and lemon juice together until combined. Serve at room temperature or chilled with pretzels for dipping.
Potatoes beware, asparagus are dressing up as French fries.
